title: vandhEham sharadham
sahitya:
vandEham shAradAm vishAradAm jnAnadAm varadAm






anupallavi







shuddha satva svarUpiNIm svacca hrdaya nivAsinIm svaprakAsha rUpiNIm







caraNam







parAtpara vidyA bhUSitAm suravara sujana sEvitAm sulabhAm su-svara



vidyA niratAm
